Frequent Google critic Consumer Watchdog blasted the announcement and repeated its call for outgoing Google CEO Eric Schmidt to explain the incident to lawmakers. The details of the biggest privacy breach in history shouldn't be settled in secret, said John Simpson, director of Consumer Watchdog's Inside Google Project.
